Verses: 1 karththar Raajaavai Sutrilumirundha Avanudaiya Ellaa Saththurukkalukkum Avanai Neengalaakki, Ilaippaarappanninapodhu, Avan Than Veettile Vaasamaayirukkaiyil,
2 raajaa Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Naaththaanai Nokki: Paarum, Kedhurumarangalaal Seyyappatta Veettile Naan Vaasampannumpodhu, Dhevanudaiya Petti Thiraigalin Naduve Vaasamaayirukkiradhe Endraan.
3 appozhudhu Naaththaan Raajaavai Nokki: Neer Poi Ummudaiya Irudhayaththil Ullapadiyellaam Seyyum; Karththar Ummodu Irukkiraare Endraan.
4 andru Raaththiriyile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Naaththaanukku Undaagi, Avar:
5 nee Poi En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Naan Vaasamaayirukkaththakka Aalayaththai Nee Enakkuk Kattuvaayo?
6 naan Isravel Puththirarai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappannina Naalmudharkondu Innaalvaraikkum, Naan Oru Aalayaththile Vaasampannaamal, Koodaaraththilum Vaasasthalaththilum Ulaavinen.

7 naan Isravelaagiya En Janaththai Meykkumpadi Kattalaiyitta Isravel Koththirangalil Oru Koththiraththaiyaavadhu Nokki: Neengal Enakkuk Kedhurumaraththaal Seyyappatta Aalayaththaik Kattaadhirukkiradhu Enna Endru Naan Isravel Puththirarukkul Ulaavivandha Evvidaththilaavadhu Yaadhoru Vaarththaiyai Sonnadhundo?

8 ippodhum Nee En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Nee Isravel Engira En Janangalukku Adhipadhiyaayirukkumpadi, Aadugalin Pinne Nadandha Unnai Naan Aattumandhaiyaivittu Eduththu,
9 nee Pona Evvidaththilum Unnode Irundhu, Un Saththurukkalaiyellaam Unakku Munbaaga Nirmoolamaakki, Boomiyilirukkira Periyorgalin Naamaththirku Oththa Periya Naamaththai Unakku Undaakkinen.

10 naan En Janamaagiya Isravelukku Oru Idaththai Erpaduththi, Avargal Thangal Sthaanaththile Kudiyirukkavum, Ini Avargal Alaiyaamalum, Munpolum, Naan En Janamaagiya Isravelinmel Nyaayaadhipadhigalaik Kattalaiyitta Naalvaraiyil Nadandhadhupolum, Nyaayakkettin Makkalaal Ini Sirumaippadaamalum Irukkumpadi Avargalai Naattinen.
11 unnudaiya Ellaa Saththurukkalukkum Unnai Neengalaakki, Ilaippaaravum Panninen; Ippodhum Karththar Unakku Veettai Undupannuvaar Enbadhaik Karththar Unakku Arivikkiraar.
12 un Naatkal Niraiveri, Nee Un Pidhaakkalode Niththiraipannumpodhu, Naan Unakkuppinbu Un Karppappirappaagiya Un Sandhadhiyai Ezhumbappanni, Avan Raajyaththai Nilaippaduththuven.
13 avan En Naamaththirkendru Oru Aalayaththaik Kattuvaan; Avan Raajyabaaraththin Singaasanaththai Endraikkum Nilaikkappannuven.
14 naan Avanukkup Pidhaavaayiruppen, Avan Enakkuk Kumaaranaayiruppaan; Avan Akkiramam Seydhaal, Naan Avanai Manusharudaiya Milaatrinaalum Manupuththirarudaiya Adigalinaalum Dhandippen.
15 unakku Munbaaga Naan Thallivitta Savulidaththilirundhu En Kirubaiyai Vilakkinadhupola Avanaivittu Vilakkamaatten.
16 un Veedum, Un Raajyamum, Endrendraikkum Unakku Munbaaga Sthirappattirukkum; Un Raajaasanam Endrendraikkum Nilaipetrirukkum Engiraar Endru Sollachchonnaar.
17 naaththaan Indha Ellaa Vaarththaigalinpadiyum, Indha Ellaa Dharisanaththinpadiyum, Dhaaveedhukku Sonnaan.

18 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhuraajaa Utpravesiththu, Karththarudaiya Samugaththilirundhu: Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Dhevareer Ennai Idhuvaraikkum Konduvandhadharku, Naan Emmaaththiram? En Veedum Emmaaththiram?

19 karththaraagiya Aandavare, Idhu Innum Ummudaiya Paarvaikkuk Konjakaariyamaayirukkiradhu Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavaraayirukkira Dhevareer Ummudaiya Adiyaanudaiya Veettaikkuriththu, Vegudhooramaayirukkum Kaalaththuchcheydhiyai Manushar Muraimaiyaai Sonneere.
20 ini Dhaaveedhu Ummidaththil Sollavendiyadhu Enna? Karththaraagiya Aandavaraayirukkira Neer Umadhu Adiyaanai Ariveer.
21 ummudaiya Vaakkuththaththaththinimiththamum, Ummudaiya Siththaththinpadiyeyum, Indhap Periya Kaariyangalaiyellaam Umadhu Adiyaanukku Arivikkumpadikku Dhayavuseydheer.

22 aagaiyaal Dhevanaagiya Karththare, Neer Periyavar Endru Vilangugiradhu; Naangal Engal Kaadhugalaale Ketta Sagala Kaariyangalinpadiyum, Dhevareerukku Nigaraanavar Illai; Ummaiththavira Vere Dhevanum Illai.

23 ummudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelukku Nigaraana Janamum Undo? Boologaththu Jaadhigalil Indha Ore Jaadhiyai Dhevan Thamakku Janamaaga Meetkiradharkum, Thamakkuk Keerththi Vilangappannugiradharkum Erpattaare; Dhevareer Egipthilirundhu Meettukkonduvandha Ummudaiya Janaththirkumunbaaga Bayangaramaana Periya Kaariyangalai Nadaththi, Ummudaiya Dhesaththirkum, Adhilirundha Jaadhigalukkum, Avargal Dhevargalukkum, Umadhu Magimaiyai Vilangachcheydhu,
24 ummudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelar Endraikkum Ummudaiya Janamaayiruppadharku, Avargalaith Thidappaduththi, Karththaraagiya Neerdhaame Avargalukku Dhevanaaneer.
25 ippodhum Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Neer Umadhu Adiyaanaiyum Avan Veettaiyum Kuriththu Sonna Vaarththaiyai Endrendraikkum Nilaivarappaduththa, Dhevareer Sonnapadiye Seydharulum.
26 appadiye Senaigalin Karththar Isravelinmel Dhevanaanavar Endru Solli, Ummudaiya Naamam Endrendraikkum Magimaippaduvadhaaga; Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Veedu Umakku Munbaaga Nilainirpadhaaga.

27 unakku Veedukattuven Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththaraayirukkira Neer Umadhu Adiyaanin Sevikku Velippaduththineer; Aagaiyaal Ummai Nokki Indha Vinnappaththai Seyya Umadhu Adiyaanukku Manaththairiyam Kidaiththadhu.
28 ippodhum Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Neere Dhevan; Ummudaiya Vaarththaigal Saththiyam; Dhevareer Umadhu Adiyaanukku Indha Nalviseshangalai Vaakkuththaththampannineer.

29 ippodhum Umadhu Adiyaanin Veedu Endraikkum Umakku Munbaaga Irukkumpadi Adhai Aaseervadhiththarulum; Karththaraana Aandavaraagiya Dhevareer Adhai Sonneer, Ummudaiya Aaseervaadhaththinaale Umadhu Adiyaanin Veedu Endraikkum Aaseervadhikkappattiruppadhaaga Endraan.
